name: Fatelocked Protoype
description:
Controls 

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
  • ALT = A
  • B = Crtl
  • Shift = Select
  • Start = Enter

Use Crtl to open Kimeter

Shift to open menu

This is a demo of Fatelocked. Here I'll be testing game mechanics and showing previews.

It's a game about ponies and ghosts. 

Made it GB Studio.
